alert.note: Alert for Estill; Jackson; Rockcastle (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 27 at 9:29PM EDT until July 27 at 10:00PM EDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: The National Weather Service in JACKSON KY has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Estill County in east central Kentucky... Northwestern Jackson County in southeastern Kentucky... Northeastern Rockcastle County in south central Kentucky... * Until 1000 PM EDT. * At 929 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Disputanta, or 7 miles northeast of Mount Vernon, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Climax around 935 PM EDT. Clover Bottom around 940 PM EDT. Kerby Knob around 945 PM EDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Brazil and Foxtown. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
